section.p: This section identifies specific household traits of the patient. This section may help identify whether substance abuse is present in the household since it often a pre-condition to staying sober. Other household traits (e.g. primary source of income) are derived from this assessment section.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] sourceOfIncome with data type Code
This coded attribute specifies the type of income (e.g. supplemental social security insurance -SSI, food stamps, employment).

Contains exactly one [1..1] presenceofSubstanceAbuse with data type Boolean
This boolean attribute specifies the presence of substance abuse in the household shared by the patient.
